example1.title: {{0}}Sibonelo sekhodi yelikhasi lasekhaya
example1.annotation1: Tfola kutsi ligama lesizinda lelifanako yini Uma kungasinjalo, buyisela {{0}} futsi ungasasebentisi.
example1.annotation2: Tfola kutsi {{0}} noma likhasi lasekhaya lesiteshi.
example1.annotation3: Tfola kutsi likhasi levidiyo yini Indlela yalo icala nga /watch Uma kunjalo, {{0}} itawubuyiselwa.
example1.annotation4: Tfola kutsi likhasi levidiyo lemfisha yini indlela yalo icala nga /shorts/ Uma kunjalo, {{0}} itawubuyiselwa.
